price: 43.Tah jahannam giray umeynit addunyal dirabboysak sugte kinni Keenik iyyaanah.
arabic: هَٰذِهِۦ جَهَنَّمُ ٱلَّتِي يُكَذِّبُ بِهَا ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: hādhihi jahannamu allatī yukadhibu bihā al-muj'rimūna
